document_data.name: Commani
document_data.mainbody: '''Commani''' was a language in the [[Imaskari languages]] group,<ref name=D:SiT-p29>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}} spoken in the western [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: Like other languages in the same region, Commani had round and broad vowel sounds with rolled R sounds.
document_data.Speakers: This tongue was spoken by the nomadic [[Commani]] tribe.
document_data.Script: Commani did not have a written form.<ref name=D:SiT-p29 />
document_data.History: It was considered to be one of the [[Northern Imaskari languages]]<ref name=D:SiT-p29 /> and was strongly influenced by the empire of [[Raumathar]].
